Language:

Español-English

-MUSHURT-

Sinopsis:

In the entire county when a violent child is expelled, he is sent to Hurbs, a small religious town that celebrates the mushurt as a custom, a festival about which little is known unless you belong to it

Controls:

WASD-Move

Mouse-Look

Shift-Run/Brake(Bike) 

E-Interact

Q-Drop

Space-Jump

F-Flashlight

Genre:Adventure/horror

Sinopsis:

En todo el condado cuando se expulsa a un niño violento se le envía a Hurbs, un pequeño pueblo religioso que celebra como costumbre el mushurt, una fiesta de la que poco se sabe a no ser que se pertenezca a ella

controles:
